snippet: A study conducted by TrimTabs Investment Research and BarclayHedge showed hedge fund inflows rose $2.3 billion in March, a significantly slower pace than in March 2011, as the sector underperforms when compared with the Standard & Poor's 500-stock...
abstract: A study conducted by TrimTabs Investment Research and BarclayHedge showed hedge fund inflows rose $2.3 billion in March, a significantly slower pace than in March 2011, as the sector underperforms when compared with the Standard & Poor's 500-stock index.

headline.main: Hedge Fund Inflows Slowing, a Report Indicates
